author: CandleSmartHome.com
description: Let your Raspberry Pi generate a wifi hotspot. Connect your wifi-based smart home devices to this hotspot to stop them from connecting to the internet without your permission.
name: Hotspot

Hotspot name.description: The name of the wifi hotspot.

Hotspot password.description: The password for the wifi hotspot.

Debugging.description: Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
